description: Dive into "Sun-Kissed Shores of Pattaya" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Sun-Kissed Shores of Pattaya

places.generalDescription: Pattaya Beach is a bustling and popular destination with a 4 km crescent-shaped coast divided into three zones: north, center, and south. Visitors can enjoy lounging on beach chairs, engaging in water sports like parasailing, or exploring the nearby restaurants and shops.

sources.snippet: There‚Äôs no better place to start than the most popular and most lively beach in the city ‚Äì Pattaya beach. At four kilometers long, this crescent-shaped beach has plenty of space for visitors and it needs it too, with plenty of people descending upon it to take advantage of the blazing sun and warm weather. There‚Äôs more than sunbathing on offer though.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches In Pattaya, Thailand

sources.snippet: Pattaya Beach, one of the most well-known beaches in Thailand with an iconic ‚ÄúPattaya City‚Äù sign on the everlasting green mountain, is welcoming all visitors to have fun, fun, fun on its charming seashore, which was being renovated just not long ago. In addition to the spectacular beach, which offers a variety of water sports for visitors to enjoy, there are commercial districts nearby that are open for everyone to visit until it can be referred to as the true Pattaya city center.
sources.shortName: Top 5 Beautiful Beaches in Pattaya (Updated 2024)

sources.snippet: Being close to the sea, the adjoining beaches of Pattaya City, from Naklua Bay to Wong Phrachan (Crescent Moon) and Wong Amat beaches in the north down to Jomtien and Na Jomtien beaches in the south, cover a total length of about 20 km. In the past, only the area of Pattaya Bay known as Pattaya beach played an important role in the tourism aspect. But for now, the increasing popularity of tourism in Pattaya has made all of its adjacent beaches so lively as well.
sources.shortName: Pattaya Beaches

sources.snippet: This is the most popular beach in Pattaya, stretching for about 3 kilometers along the coastline starting from south Pattaya all the way to the famous Walking Street. Pattaya Beach is the perfect spot for chilling with the family and friends on cozy beach chairs with umbrellas while enjoying beautiful views of the ocean. With soft golden sand and beautiful water, Pattaya Beach is also the ultimate destination for parasailing, jet skiing, and banana boats.
sources.shortName: 8 Best Beaches in Pattaya in 2024

sources.snippet: It might seem strange to list Pattaya Beach as the last on this list of the top beaches in the city‚Äîbut it'll make sense once you get there. Indeed, these crowded and not-always-clean sands aren't necessarily the first place you'd want to sun yourself, even if they are convenient. However, if you can come and go before the seedy walking streets just offshore get going, you can really enjoy your time at Pattaya Beach.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Pattaya

sources.snippet: Pattaya Beach is about a three-four-kilometer stretch-lined white beach with palm trees with various hotels, restaurants, and shops. Each part of this beach offers different vibes, so if you are looking for a calmer stretch, you can head to the northern end for relaxation. Meanwhile, it is also known for water sports such as parasailing, jet skis, and more, while it lights up at night as a party hotspot.

reviews.text: I Recommend This place is perfect if you're into fun and entertainment. Lots of lights, music, and big crowds it's always lively with plenty of things to do. There are quite a lot of foreign tourists too since it's one of Thailand's must-visit landmarks.

The beach was okay for a casual visit. It was a bit crowded, but there were places to sit and relax. The water was decent, though not very clear. A few food stalls and shops nearby made it convenient. Nothing too special, but fine for spending a few hours.

A lovely spot with sandy shores and inviting waters, Pattaya Beach shines in June when it's pleasantly uncrowded and peaceful. it could be a bit cleaner during this off-peak time, and the vibrant city lights at night create a beautiful, relaxing view along the coast. Ideal for unwinding evening strolls by the sea with a soothing breeze and calm ambiance.

places.generalDescription: Jomtien Beach, also known as Chom Thian, is a serene 6-km stretch of sand lined with trees and offering various amenities such as loungers, bars, restaurants, and water sports. The beach provides uninterrupted views of Pattaya Bay and the surrounding area. Visitors can explore the hilltop viewpoint which offers panoramic views of Pattaya and Jomtien at any time of the day.

sources.snippet: Just two kilometers away from Pattaya beach lays Jomtien beach. Home to a quieter crowd, this palm tree lined beach is perfect if you‚Äôre all partied out and want a more subdued atmosphere. It‚Äôs not completely lifeless however as bars and restaurants are on hand nearby, and it‚Äôs a real hotspot for windsurfing and kiteboarding, which you can take part in if you wish.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches In Pattaya, Thailand

sources.snippet: Just 4 kilometers down Pattaya city, Jomtien Beach (also known as the Chom Thian), is located in the south and is a perfect location for those who seek a quieter and subdued atmosphere. This beach is surrounded by restaurants & convenience stores with beach chairs, beach umbrellas, and hawker food for tourists to sit and relax by the clear water waves of the sea. For those who love water activities, Jomtien Beach offers rides such as banana boats, jet skis, windsurfing, sailing, and parasailing.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Pattaya for a Fun Holiday

sources.snippet: Located just south of Pattaya's city center (and main beach), Jomtien Beach has a lot going for it. It's quiet enough that you won't feel like you're at a party, but there still plenty of things happening. Bordered by glistening condo towers where expats and wealthy Thais alike make their coastal homes, Jomtien is a bit cosmopolitan compared to some of the other beaches, though there's plenty of Thai flavor here‚Äîliterally, thanks to all the street food stalls on the main road.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Pattaya

sources.snippet: Jomtien Beach, one of Chon Buri‚Äôs most famous beaches, is located in the south of Pattaya, only 4 kilometers from Pattaya city. The beach‚Äôs environment is rather serene and peaceful, even though it has numerous exciting water activities including full facilities. In the evening, Jomtien Beach has a flea market with seafood and a variety of delectable street foods; this fantastic beachside market begins at 5:00 p.m., assuring that you will find something wonderful to eat.

sources.snippet: The 6 km straight stretch of sand of Jomtien Beach is a much quieter place compared to its rowdy neighbour to the north. It still has many attractions ‚Äì some of which are world firsts ‚Äì but the biggest is, without a doubt, the pleasure of a leisurely day on the sandy shore, splashing in the clean and uncluttered sea and enjoying the cheap seafood snacks available from wandering vendors.

places.name: Jomtien Beach

reviews.text: This beach is a nice spot to relax and enjoy a quiet moment by the water. The sand is clean, the sea is calm, and it's perfect for a walk or simply sitting down to admire the view. The sunsets are particularly lovely, with a soft light that's perfect for ending the day üòé‚òÄÔ∏èüôÇüôèüåá

Visited on the weekend and it wasn't crowded at all-not surprising though, as the water isn't very clean. It's okay for a stroll or to relax by the shore, but not ideal for swimming. Also, be careful if you're a tourist-many shopkeepers charge quite high prices, so it's best to compare or ask locals first. Still, it's a more peaceful alternative to Pattaya Beach.

Jomtien Beach is a nice, long beach with a huge promenade that's perfect for a walk. It has a relaxed atmosphere with plenty of sun umbrella areas and food stalls, making it a great place to spend the day. I found it to be especially enjoyable during the day.
‚ÄãJust be aware that some sections are currently under construction, so you might need to watch out for that. Also, people tend to do a lot of activities early in the morning, which adds a lively touch to the atmosphere.

places.generalDescription: Nestled just a short stroll from the serene shores of Cosy Beach, the Cosy Beach Hotel is a stylish retreat that perfectly blends comfort and convenience. This sleek establishment features chic accommodations equipped with plush beds and pristine bathrooms, ensuring a restful stay. Guests can indulge in delightful culinary experiences at the on-site restaurant, which offers an array of international dishes to satisfy every palate. For those looking to unwind, two inviting outdoor pools await, alongside rejuvenating Thai massages available on-site.

sources.snippet: If you are looking for something more secluded, Cosy Beach is a small beach between Pattaya Beach and Jomtien Beach. This quiet beach offers hotel stays, as well as eateries and bars that are considered less happening than Pattaya or Jomtien Beach, making it a perfect spot for a quiet afternoon to unwind. It is also relatively family-friendly.
sources.shortName: Most beautiful beaches around Pattaya Thailand and where to stay

places.name: Cosy Beach Hotel - SHA Extra Plus

reviews.text: Thank you so much to the lovely staff who gave my son so much attention. They made our stay that little bit extra special. The hotel is also great with the beautiful location and the rooms were good, spacious. There is good facilities and restaurants on the hotel grounds. All the receptionist staff we're so nice and friendly. Thank you again.

‚úÖGood breakfast.
‚úÖClean rooms.
‚úÖMassages, 7/11, tops daily are close.
‚úÖ Hotel provides towel for a beach and swimming pool.  Really cool üëç

üõëBeach is right in front of the hotel but there is no sun-bed from hotel. Beach is boarding - not popular at all.
üõë too many Russians - no English speakers in the hotel
üõë far away from Main streets. We  have been taking taxi all the time  (50-100 bhat)

Good stay overall, but with minor issues.

The location is excellent, and the hotel is divided into two separate buildings - one for Superior Rooms and the other for Deluxe Rooms.

I had a minor issue at check-in due to the staff not speaking English, which made communication a bit difficult. When I entered my room, a maintenance worker was still repairing the air conditioning. The receptionist kindly offered me an alternative room while waiting, and the staff were cooperative and helpful. The repair didn't take long, which I appreciated.

However, I had booked a Deluxe Room with one large bed, but I was given a room with two twin beds instead, which was disappointing.

Overall, it was a good experience with helpful staff, but there's room for improvement in communication and booking accuracy.
*Dr. Hesham*

places.generalDescription: Dongtan Beach, situated north of Jomtien Beach in Pattaya, is a serene and peaceful 1.5 km stretch of sandy shoreline. Dongtan Beach is very nice. I gave it 4* because the water is not crystal clear. Go to #14  -- Tum and his sisters will take good care of you.

Nice peaceful beach from 7 Eleven up to the police station. Have many chair rentals to relax and provide you with food and drinks. Or stay near The Big 7, Eleven .
But be aware, no alcohol can be bought from 2 pm until 5 pm .

places.address: 311-2 Thappraya Rd, Pattaya City, Bang Lamung District, Chon Buri 20150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Dongtan Beach in Pattaya is a popular spot for the LGBTQ+ community, with a dedicated section on the beach. It spans 1.5 kilometers and features palm trees along its border. The area offers easy access to restaurants and a convenient bus link to Bangkok. The beach is known for its cleanliness compared to other beaches in Pattaya and can be easily reached by Songthaew from the city.

sources.snippet: Once you have arrived at Jomtien beach, turn right instead of left and you will arrive at Dongtan beach. A more secluded area than Jomtien beach with golden color sand. Take a long walk and stop by the different bars and restaurants along the road, or spend time by the beach with a lot of space for beach swimmers.
sources.shortName: 5 Top beaches in Pattaya that you should visit

places.name: Dongtan Beach

reviews.text:
Thank you for giving the beach back to the tourists. It looks so beautiful without all the chairs and umbrellas. This should be done more often in Pattaya because the beaches have so much potential.

(Take away your parasols and chairs, and think a little about the tourists! Give us back our beach. It was so beautiful before!)

Next to Pattaya beach but a bit more secluded and has a different feel to it.

Plenty of restaurants and bars within easy reach, plus many shaded areas but these are often taken over by the consortiums selling deck chair space.

Also a bit of a wind surfing beach.

I stayed at Welcome World Beachfront Resort, which is right next to Dongtan Beach, and it was the perfect spot for a relaxing getaway. The beach is less crowded than other parts of Pattaya, making it ideal for a quiet day by the sea. There are also some lovely beachfront cafes nearby where you can enjoy delicious food with a beautiful view. A truly relaxing experience.

places.address: Pattaya City, Bang Lamung District, Chon Buri 20150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Bang Saray Beach, located in Pattaya, is a hidden gem with pristine white sand and a tranquil atmosphere. It's an ideal destination for those seeking solitude and relaxation as it's less crowded compared to other beaches in the area. While not as developed, the picturesque views make it perfect for unwinding and capturing stunning moments. The beach offers palm-shaded areas where visitors can bask in the soothing sound of waves and enjoy the warmth of the sun.

sources.snippet: Located near a pleasantly quaint Thai town, this sandy beach has a local feel with fishing piers nearby and a lack of some of the more lively aspects of the other beaches in Pattaya. The beach is great for divers; whale sharks often visit the area, and there‚Äôs the remnants of a cargo ship that was sunk in WWII resting beneath the waves just waiting to be explored by divers.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches In Pattaya Thailand

sources.snippet: Pattaya got another hidden gem called Bang Saray Beach that offers the finest white sand that you can find in Thailand. It is the best beach for soul-searching and meditation, as only a few people are visiting the place that it‚Äôs almost a private resort. Although there are not much to do in Bang Saray Beach as it is not well-developed like the other Pattaya beaches, the picturesque view itself will surely satisfy your eyes and even your camera√¢s lens.If you are one of those who just love to embrace the calming sound of the sea waves while feeling the heat of the sun under a palm tree, then you have found your beach.
sources.shortName: The 21 best beaches in Pattaya and greatest properties around.

sources.snippet: Located 24 kilometers from the hustle-and-bustle of Pattaya town, it is a serene and beautiful coastal area that is mostly known for its fishing village vibes, authentic local charm, laid-back atmosphere, and seafood restaurants. Bang Saray Beach is also home to several luxury beachfront villas with the likes of U Pattaya, Cross Pattaya Oceanphere, RimLay Beachfront Pool Villa, and Sea Sand Sun Resort. There are quite a few incredible private pool villas in the neighborhood as well.
sources.shortName: 8 Best Beaches in Pattaya in 2024

sources.snippet: If you are looking for quiet and peaceful beaches in Pattaya, away from the hedonism that defines the rest of the city, then one of the best options is Bang Saray Beach. The beach is known for its pleasant stretches of sand that are secluded and allows you to take in the natural beauty of the coast without crowds of tourists. There are very few hotels and haunts on the beach, further ensuring peace and quiet for those who do visit.
sources.shortName: 15 Beaches in Pattaya For A Fun Filled Vacation in 2025

sources.snippet: Another one of the most famous beaches in Pattaya that are sheltered away from noise is Bang Saray Beach, south of Pattaya. It‚Äôs popular for scuba diving and a prominent destination for spotting whale sharks. This is also where you can spot the ruins of a cargo ship that sank during World War II. Fishing is a popular activity here and the beach has few fishing piers.
sources.shortName: Visit 9 Of The Best Beaches In Pattaya

sources.snippet: Further down from Pattaya towards Nongnuch garden before reaching Sattahip, you will find bangsaray beach. It is one of the quietest beaches in Pattaya where you can truly enjoy peaceful environment and relax. In Bangsaray you will find beach activities such as banana boat ride, take a stroll along the beach or simply roll out your beach towels and enjoy the sun.
sources.shortName: 5 Top beaches in Pattaya that you should visit

sources.snippet: Located the farthest south among all the beaches on this list, Bang Saray also feels the most isolated. This is perfect if you're looking for some R&R and don't want to be stimulated, intellectually or otherwise. However, you can make the journey all this way worth it by visiting the nearby Ramayana Water Park, or stopping at Pattaya Dolphin World en route.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches in Pattaya

sources.snippet: is located near the town of Habiva and is less lively and crowded than the other beaches in the vicinity. Perfect for divers and whale sharks often visit its surroundings. There are also remains of a cargo ship that was sunk during the Second World War, resting in the depths of the water and waiting for the divers to visit.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Pattaya - simply Thailand

sources.snippet: Located an easy 25-minute drive south of Pattaya, Bang Saray is one of the best beaches in the area. Bang Saray has a very local feel, and even in the peak season, you are more likely to see fishermen and local families than foreign tourists. If you like quiet rural beaches with powdery sand, this is the place for you.
sources.shortName: A Guide to the Best Beaches in Pattaya

sources.snippet: Bang Saray Beach is a former fishing village known for its calm waters and local charm. The sand is powdery and white, and the beach is well-maintained. It‚Äôs a bit off the beaten path, making it a great spot for those who wish to escape the tourist crowds and enjoy a more authentic Thai beach experience.
sources.siteName: Mason - Ultra luxury resort in Na Jomtien Chonburi
sources.shortName: 7 Must-visit Beaches in Pattaya Thailand

sources.snippet: The Bang Saray beach is located in a quiet and pristine place without high-rises and throngs of tourists, around 15 km from the center of Pattaya. This is the place where you can enjoy a a beach day away from civilization. This beach itself is not like the rest of Pattaya‚Äôs beaches.
sources.shortName: 11 Cleanest Beaches in and Around Pattaya ‚Äì Joys of Traveling

sources.snippet: Bang Saray Beach is located in a fairly small town south of Pattaya. This sandy beach has a local feel with nearby fishing piers and the lack of the lively aspects you can find on the other beaches in Pattaya. Therefore, the beach is perfect for feeling comfortable and relaxed.
sources.shortName: 7 Most Popular Beaches in Pattaya, Thailand

sources.snippet: Located in the Sattahip district of Chon Buri province of Thailand, Bang Saray is one of the best beaches in the area. Even in the peak season, this place has a very local feel. Fresh seafood is served at many small restaurants around the beach.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Pattaya for a Fun Holiday

sources.snippet: Located north of Jomtien Beach, Dongtan is the quietest beach in Pattaya city. It is about a 1.5 km long strip of golden sand backed by palm trees. This scenic beach is perfect for swimming, sailing, and fishing.
sources.shortName: Most beautiful beaches around Pattaya Thailand and where to stay

sources.snippet: It‚Äôs peaceful, with beautiful gardens nearby and the freshest seafood. Location/Address: About 20 km south of Pattaya. Best Things To Do: Visit the nearby gardens, and enjoy fresh seafood.
sources.shortName: Exploring Beaches in Pattaya: Top Beaches for Every Traveler

places.name: Bang Saray Beach

reviews.text: Beautiful beach at sunset. Super long beach and plenty of space. Some street food sellers. Some parking on the road that runs along the beach. Popular with families and couples that come to chill on the beach in the evenings.
Quite a long but narrow beach, for swimming the east end of the beach is better and very quiet. Many nice seafood restaurants along the front.

Lovely beach, clean and not crowded at all. Maybe we were lucky because it's not peak tourist season. There is also a safe swim area. The street along the beach has quite a lot of restaurants and bars where you can enjoy both Thai and Western cuisine.

places.address: Amphoe Sattahip, Chang Wat Chon Buri 20250, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Ban Amphur Beach is a serene and uncrowded ocean beach located in a quiet fishing village. The beach offers calm waters for swimming, chair rentals, and a kids' playground. With its beautiful sand, palm trees, and ample parking, it provides a peaceful escape from the bustling beaches of Pattaya. Visitors can enjoy delicious and fresh seafood from the various restaurants in the fishing harbor at reasonable prices due to lower tourism impact.

sources.snippet: Bang Amphur Beach is one of the most romantic beaches in Pattaya and is a must-visit during a vacation in Pattaya Thailand. It boasts plush green coastal vegetation, sizzling sand, and a scenic shoreline with palm trees. The beach is still unobscured because sellers are not allowed to reserve areas to make tables that will obscure the beautiful view, but recently there pop up some in the evening on the beach but small.
sources.shortName: Most beautiful beaches around Pattaya Thailand and where to stay

sources.snippet: When you drive from Pattaya Beach for about 15 kilometers more, you will find another white sand beach called Ban Amphur Beach. This beach is ideal for families because it offers a variety of recreational activities for children, such as playgrounds. Once the kids get tired of swimming, they have the option to either swing, slide, or use the seesaws.
sources.shortName: The 21 best beaches in Pattaya and greatest properties around.

sources.snippet: The secluded Ban Amphur beach is in the south of Pattaya, located about 15 km from the center and a few kms from Jomtien. It is impossible to get here via travel agencies, because there are practically no housing and chain hotels nearby. There are also practically no foreigners on the beach.
sources.shortName: 11 Cleanest Beaches in and Around Pattaya ‚Äì Joys of Traveling

places.name: Ban Amphur Beach

reviews.text: So quiet and clean. Mostly Thai people. Not many tourists. It's a really beautiful beach. It has no shade, but there are so restaurants very close to the beach. So much quieter than Jomtien and Pattaya.

A great clean and quiet beach with clean water‚Ä¶ better as the beaches in Pattaya‚Ä¶. A short trip with a crab car‚Ä¶ sunbed costs 100 baht per day.. food comes from a restaurant nearby but yummy‚Ä¶ definitely a great place to relax

Ban Amphur Beach was clean and had a peaceful atmosphere. We only walked for about 10 minutes, but it was a nice stroll. It would have been great to walk on the pier, but overall, it's a lovely spot to visit!

places.address: Thailand, Amphoe Sattahip, Chang Wat Chon Buri 20250, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Cozy Beach, also known as Kasetsin Beach, is a serene and picturesque spot nestled between Pattaya Beach and Jomtien Beach in Pattaya. It's just a short drive away from the bustling Pattaya Beach. The beach is situated in a charming bay with plenty of natural shade provided by the surrounding trees. Visitors can enjoy various activities such as paddle boating and massages while lounging on the beach chairs.

sources.snippet: Little-known to many, Cozy Beach is a hidden gem, literally surrounded by lush tropical greenery and trees. The water here, while not as pristine as some more remote beaches, is significantly cleaner than that found in the bustling center of Thailand's mainland. This makes Cozy Beach an ideal spot for those planning a serene beach vacation.
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Pattaya

sources.snippet: Between the center of Pattaya and its southern part, on Cape Pratamnak, there are several picturesque beaches. One of them, located at the Cozy Beach Hotel, goes by the same name. Although entry is allowed to all, it is mostly the local residents and guests of nearby hotels that can be found sunbathing and swimming here.
sources.shortName: 11 Cleanest Beaches in and Around Pattaya ‚Äì Joys of Traveling

sources.snippet: Or rather, not so, they all belong to the King, and he, in turn, allows the people to use any beach at their discretion.

sources.snippet: From the Royal Cliff Beach Hotel you look out over Cozy Beach from the beautiful swimming pool on the edge of a cliff.

places.name: Cozy Beach

reviews.text:
Cozy Beach is a hidden gem located in the heart of the city. It is a perfect place to relax and unwind with your family and friends. The beach is not too crowded, even on weekends, so you can always find a spot to spread out your towel and soak up the sun.

The service at Cozy Beach is excellent. The staff is friendly and attentive, and they are always willing to go the extra mile to make sure you have a enjoyable experience. They offer a variety of food and drinks, which are reasonably priced.

The sand at Cozy Beach is soft and clean, and the water is clear and refreshing. There are plenty of umbrellas and sunbeds for rent, so you can relax in comfort. The beach is also well-maintained, with clean restrooms and showers.

Overall, Cozy Beach is a great place to spend a day at the beach. The excellent service, soft sand, and clear water make it a perfect place to relax and unwind.

Here are some additional details that you may want to include in your review:

The beach is located in a quiet area, so it is perfect for people who want to escape the hustle and bustle of the city.

The beach is safe for children, as there are lifeguards on duty.

There are a variety of water sports available, such as swimming, snorkeling, and kayaking.

The beach is also a great place to watch the sunset.

Probably the best beach in Pattaya if you don't count Ko Lan. Backed up by supple greenery this beach in a veritable oasis, with lots of shade and deck chairs.

However, in high season, it is rather crowded (teeming with Russians), and it can be a challenge to get a deck chair (100 Baht). Moreover, there is unfortunately some pollution on the beach, which even may be hazardous. Be careful where you step.

Chill beach, hidden/tucked away. When I was there though it was really low water level so hard to swim. You get both - severalfancy cafes at the top, and just locals selling beer and coconuts on the beach. There are swings and water to rinse sand off

places.address: Bang Lamung District, Chon Buri 20150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Bamboo Beach is a serene and mellow beach located just north of Wong Amat Beach in Pattaya. Accessible from a walking path past Siam Penthouse Condo 3, it offers a nice change of pace from the busier venues in the area. The Bamboo Beach Bar, situated by the shore, provides stunning ocean views and a relaxed atmosphere to unwind. While reasonably priced drinks and friendly staff enhance the experience, it can get crowded on weekends.

sources.snippet: If you are looking for unique and secluded beaches in Pattaya, one of the lesser-known haunts is the beautiful Bamboo Beach. The beach is located in the gulf, which makes the waters peaceful and shallow, with hardly any waves, which is ideal for quiet swims. It is also one of the cleanest beaches in Pattaya, with pristine white sand lining the shores and quaint cafes and hotels where you can stop by for a relaxing meal.
sources.shortName: 15 Beaches in Pattaya For A Fun Filled Vacation in 2025

sources.snippet: One of the best beaches in Pattaya that offers a serene and peaceful place is the beach around the Wongamat area, known as the Bamboo Beach. Most people are not aware of this beautiful beach hidden in their town, so you can expect a quiet, calm, and clean place to relax. Moreover, the bamboo beach is also surrounded by affordable condominium units.
sources.shortName: The 21 best beaches in Pattaya and greatest properties around.

sources.snippet: It's a nice little bay with numerous restaurants and clubs where you can rent sunbeds and relax. Enjoy light cultural entertainment with colourful cocktails & Jamaican hospitality. When you walk down Bamboo Beach in the northern direction, you come to a concrete pier which is a perfect place to watch the sunset.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Pattaya for a Fun Holiday

sources.snippet: There is a cozy restaurant with a bar where you can also rent sunbeds. The beach at Bamboo Beach is partially lined with trees that provide shade. Behind it is the skyline with tall buildings that makes you realize again that you are in a big coastal city.
sources.shortName: Pattaya Beaches - Which one is your favorite?

places.name: Bamboo Beach

reviews.text: The servers are accommodating.  The place is good for dining. Good view, great food taste and affordable price.  They have a fire show on weekends.
Lovely place. Food was good. Drinks are a bit over priced. Really rustic. I'm sure like Pattaya in the old days. Lovely beach.

Good place to have food. Items are fairly priced. Comparing that, it is a beachfront place to eat. Would recommend To eat here, if you are nearby.

Beach is just in front and can also be used for taking a walk or picnic.

places.generalDescription: Embark on a day excursion to Pattaya Coral Island by Sea Tours, where you can explore the nearby Koh Larn. This island is renowned for its crystal-clear waters and picturesque beaches, making it an ideal destination for a day of relaxation and water activities.

sources.snippet: Koh Larn Beach on Coral Island is one of the most beautiful Pattaya Beaches. It is loved by tourists and locals alike. The speciality of the beach is its sprawling coral reefs that you can explore via snorkelling and scuba diving in some of the bluest waters in the waters.
sources.shortName: 15 Beaches in Pattaya For A Fun Filled Vacation in 2025

places.name: Pattaya Coral Island by Sea Tours

reviews.text: very good place to visit with family or a couple. there are many activities at coral island such a para sailing,para gliding,bannana boat,jet ske,under water coral walk. dont forget to grab your swimsuit because you might get wet.

Overall good experience, but just need some more safety precautions for the underwater dives.

Thanks for your service
Wow awesome üëå üëç

places.generalDescription: Wong Amat Beach is a tranquil and secluded spot near Naklua beach in Pattaya. Unlike the bustling Pattaya Beach, Wong Amat offers a quieter and cleaner environment, perfect for those seeking relaxation away from the crowds and noisy activities. Visitors can enjoy a peaceful stroll along the shore or bask in the sun without disturbances.

sources.snippet: Not too far from Naklua beach is Wong Amat beach, which is very much in a similar, chilled-out vein to Naklua. Despite its proximity to Pattaya beach too, it‚Äôs much quieter and much more secluded, meaning there‚Äôs a good chance it will be cleaner too. It‚Äôs a great choice for those who want to relax, away from parties and noisy water-based activities, and so should definitely be checked out for those wanting to get away from it all for a while in Pattaya.
sources.shortName: The Best Beaches In Pattaya, Thailand

sources.snippet: Wongamat Beach is another little jewel of a beach, nestling in a crescent shaped bay, Pattaya‚Äôs Wongamat Beach has everything to offer. Wongamat Beach is probably a little bigger than Cosy Beach and it‚Äôs South Pattaya neighbor, Asia Beach, but it has the same laid back and tranquil atmosphere. You hear people griping about Pattaya‚Äôs beaches all the time, they say they are crowded, dirty, and you are harassed by hawkers and vendors constantly, for the people who don‚Äôt venture beyond Pattaya Beach and Jomtien Beach there may be some truth in that, but the truth is, they are not the only beaches in Pattaya.
sources.shortName: Pattaya Beaches

sources.snippet: For those who want to avoid the crowds that throng the Pattaya Beaches, you can head to the peaceful and tranquil Wong Amat Beach, located on the fringes of the city. The beach is nestled against a crescent shaped bay that gives you a stunning view of the entire coast. The beach is also known for its palm tree thickets, which are ideal for relaxing under and enjoying intimate picnics with your loved ones.Activities To Do: Swimming, Kayaking, Canoeing, Jet-Skiing, Sunbathing, Photography, etc.Distance from Pattaya City Centre: 4.2 km Must Checkout: What To Do In Thailand Thailand Group Trips
sources.shortName: 15 Beaches in Pattaya For A Fun Filled Vacation in 2025

sources.snippet: Wong Amat Beach is located next to the northern part of Pattaya, and is one of the most beautiful beaches in Pattaya. Despite its proximity to Pattaya Beach, the beach is much quieter and much more isolated, which means there is a good chance that it will be cleaner as well. Wong Amat Beach is another option to spend your day of rest relaxed on the beach with your family, away from parties and noisy water activities.

sources.snippet: This beach is located towards Naklua area with about 3 km of curved beach to take a nice stroll and plenty of space to spend the day. Some parts could be rocky, however most of the beach is sandy. Great for family with young kids as there are not so many water activities with motor going on which is fairly safer for children.

sources.snippet: Wong Amat Beach is a lesser known beach in Pattaya, it is adjacent to Bamboo Beach and is located north of Pattaya Beach. Wong Amat beach is mostly home to luxury accommodations, such as the beautiful Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort. The resorts at this beach all have a defined stretch of sea so you can swim safely.

sources.snippet: Also situated north of Pattaya, Wong Amat Beach is also a beach to release all your stress. sources.snippet: Along the entire beach there are hotels and condominiums, and in some places, especially in the southern part of Wongamat, they are located just 5-20 meters from the sea. Thanks to these hotels, Wongamat remains the cleanest beach in Pattaya. Nevertheless, one does comes across trash here.

Devoid of large crowds even during the high season, it is best visited for some sunbathing.

places.name: Wong Amat Beach

reviews.text: This marker will lead you to a long road that deadends at the beach. Almost zero parking for cars down the last road. Ample parking for motorbikes on the beach. It's a unique beach. Very photogenic beach. Swimmable, but you need to sneak into the resort areas which I think technically are public but feel like trespassing. Many rocks to sit on. Many seafood stalls and local vibes. A hidden gem for sure.
The water looked clean enough to swim in but there was an oily film that washed in and took a while to clear.  The beach was good and we managed to get some shade under a big tree.  Not too busy.

This is our first time visiting a beach north of Pattaya. We love this beach very much because there are mostly locals here and not many tourists.

There are a few food vendors if you want snacks, beers or cold refreshments plus the many trees should provide ample shade from the sun in the scorching heat.

The natural rock formations, greenery and bay make it quite a unique beach giving it character unlike Pattaya or Jomtien beach. Naklua is also home to 5-star hotels and various beach clubs.

There is even a beach volleyball court in front of Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort (not owned by the resort).

places.generalDescription: Paradise Beach Pattaya, also known as Pratumnak Beach, is a hidden gem nestled just below Cosy Beach. This charming 500-meter stretch of sand offers a serene escape from the bustling crowds typical of larger beaches. With its shallow waters, it's perfect for families and those looking to relax in the sun. Visitors can rent loungers and umbrellas while enjoying authentic Thai cuisine from local vendors or sipping refreshing drinks at nearby bars.

sources.snippet: Pattaya Beach is a popular destination known for its vibrant atmosphere and endless entertainment options. The beach stretches for miles and offers a variety of activities for visitors, from swimming and sunbathing to jet skiing and parasailing. Along the beaches in Pattaya, there are numerous restaurants and bars where you can enjoy a delicious sea food or a refreshing drink while taking in the beautiful views of the sea.
sources.shortName: The 21 best beaches in Pattaya and greatest properties around.

sources.snippet: The 500-meters-long Paradise Beach is also known as Pratumnak Beach, and is located just below Cosy Beach. You can rent out beach chairs at the Birds and Bees Resort where you can also enjoy the nice seaside terrace. Nearby attractions include Ban Amphur Beach and Huay Yai Temple.
sources.shortName: 10 Best Beaches in Pattaya for a Fun Holiday

places.name: Paradise Beach Pattaya

reviews.text: Nice, cozy, and quiet beach. I was there in January when the water decreased, the view was stunning with the green creature. The best place to watch the sunset.

Small but nice beach 300 meter down soi 4 from Sunset Boulevard 2
Nice also to see sunset and take a beer or something to eat
Once a nice cosy beach now falling into bad disrepair. Dangerous crumbling concrete and rusting steel bars on beach. Fallen lampost on public stairs.

places.address: kosy beach, Pattaya City, Bang Lamung District, Chon Buri 20150, Thailand
